meanings.definition: A small Australian tree or shrub with lobed leaves and clusters of pink or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The kurrajong in our backyard has beautiful pink flowers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a kurrajong tree with white flowers in the park.
meanings.sent3: The kurrajong tree waved its flowery branches in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: The kurrajong stood out among the greenery like a delicate painting.
meanings.sent5: The pink flowers of the kurrajong tree brightened up the garden.

meanings.definition: The wood of the kurrajong tree, used for making furniture and tools.
meanings.sent1: The craftsman carved a beautiful chair from kurrajong wood.
meanings.sent2: The table was made of sturdy kurrajong wood.
meanings.sent3: The kurrajong wood whispered stories of the forest to the furniture maker.
meanings.sent4: The tools crafted from kurrajong wood were both strong and light.
meanings.sent5: The scent of freshly cut kurrajong wood filled the workshop.

meanings.definition: A type of Australian Aboriginal food made from the seeds of the kurrajong tree.
meanings.sent1: The Aboriginal community enjoyed a hearty meal of kurrajong seeds.
meanings.sent2: The traditional dish was prepared using kurrajong seeds.
meanings.sent3: The kurrajong seeds danced in the pot as they cooked.
meanings.sent4: The flavor of the kurrajong seed dish transported me to the Outback.
meanings.sent5: The elders shared stories around the fire while cooking kurrajong seeds.
